Key Match Events: Isiah Kiner-Falefa had three hits, including a go-ahead single in the fifth inning
Bryce Reynolds doubled to left, scoring Kiner-Falefa
Gerrriel hit a sacrifice fly to center, scoring Massey
Garcia doubled to left, scoring Gurriel
Nolan Gonzales grounded out to third, scoring Cruz, with Tellez to second, Bart to third
Kiner-Falefa singled to center, scoring Cook, and Tellez to second, Bart to third
Tellez walked, Kiner-Falefa scored, Bart to second, Cruz to third
Witt Jr. walked, scoring Gurriel, Isbel to second, Garcia to third
Post-Match Reflections: Isiah Kiner-Falefa had three hits, including a go-ahead single in the fifth inning, as the Pittsburgh Pirates avoided a three-game sweep with a 4-3 win over the Kansas City Royals on Sunday.
